group_1.textLeft: You came.

group_1.textRight: I apologize for being so late. I came across@an unfortunate situation...
I'm glad to see you again, Hinano.

group_1.textLeft: I didn't want to meet you under these@circumstances.

group_1.textRight: You're referring to Chuo Ward?

group_1.textLeft: I remember when we last met, you said...
"We will respect the territory of the Magical@Girls in Chuo Ward."
You did say that, didn't you?

group_1.textRight: Yes...

group_1.textLeft: I believed you. I wanted to believe you!
But do you see what's happened?
Bystanders have been injured, and some have@even been chased out of their territories!
Where's OUR respect?!

group_1.textCenter: She said she just found herself a new hunting@ground and ran me out.
I hate this... I really hate this... No one's@honoring the agreement.

group_1.textRight: (There's nothing I can say to answer her...)

group_1.textLeft: A lot of people from Chuo think it doesn't@matter which side we pick...
We'll just end up getting exploited either @way.
They've been pulled into the fight between@the west and the east. They can't bear it.
If this keeps up, some of them might start@to get reckless, damn the consequences.

group_1.textRight: No! That can't happen!
Why would you bring sadness to yourself out@of desperation...

group_1.textLeft: You must've seen this coming.
Desperate people will do anything.
To them, [chara:300301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:300301:lipSynch_1]it might be better than being@on the receiving end of constant abuse...

group_1.textRight: Hinano. We WILL resolve this situation.
Please give us more time!

group_1.textLeft: What's the point in telling me? I'm not the@one who can't wait anymore.

group_1.textRight: Ah...

group_1.textLeft: And you haven't shown that I can trust you.
Mifuyu, you are more experienced than I am,@and you sympathize with the pain of others.
That much I know.
But you don't have a way to fix this,@do you?
That's why this situation will never be@under control.
Am I wrong?

group_1.textRight: (I can't really argue with that, but...)

group_1.textLeft: Honestly, I had hope. I thought things would@be okay in your hands.
Like when I heard your team had come to@Chuo Ward.
I hoped you might bring us into your@community.
Personally, I leaned more to the west,@but...
Anyway, I believed in you.
I thought you'd treat the Chuo Ward@Magical Girls fairly, too.
But now look at this mess!
I shouldn't have relied on you or anyone!
I'm the oldest one here! I should've relied@on myself more!
...[wait:2.0][chara:300301:cheek_0][chara:300301:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:300301:motion_300][chara:300301:lipSynch_1]Sorry, I said too much.
It's not like I've done anything, myself.

group_1.textRight: (Hinano, I've betrayed your trust...)
(Even if I can't earn it back, I need to take@responsibility for this.)
(I can't be complacent. I'm the one in charge@of this, after all...)
I will regain control of the situation.
Before it goes beyond the point of no return.@I swear I will...

group_1.textLeft: ...@[wait:1.0][chara:300301:cheek_0][chara:300301:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:300301:motion_300][chara:300301:lipSynch_1]You have no proof you can promise this.

group_1.textRight: No, I don't.
But I...
I am one of the west's leaders, I must do@this.
I understand that you can't trust me.
But please, I need your help.
I want you to stop the Chuo Ward Magical@Girls from lashing out.
I promise to settle this quickly. So please@do this for me until then.
Please stop the girls in Chuo Ward from@hurting themselves.

group_1.textLeft: That's been my plan from the start.
I'm not any sort of leader or a mediator, so@I don't know how much control I'll have.
But I am a Chuo Ward Magical Girl. I'll do@what I can.
Because I have to.

group_1.textRight: Thank you very much.

group_1.textLeft: I don't want your words. Just give me@results.
And I'll do the same.

group_1.textRight: I will.

group_1.textCenter: (I'm a leader of the west, so I need to@have their best interests in mind.)
(Yachan, I know this much for sure.)
(But first and foremost, I am a Kamihama@Magical Girl.)
(I need to consider the greater good of all@Magical Girls in Kamihama.)
(I've got to stop this pointless battle, and@stop people from getting hurt...)
(I'm the oldest here, and I have power.@I can't take it easy on myself.)
(This is a problem concerning both the west@and the east...)
(It's not the time for the leaders of the @two to be at each other's throats.)
(I'll talk to Yachan and find some way to@get some cooperation going.)
